verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> I will sing <WH7891> of mercy <WH2617> and judgment: <WH4941> unto thee, O LORD, <WH3068> will I sing. <WH2167>

I will behave myself wisely <WH7919> in a perfect <WH8549> way. <WH1870> O when <WH4970> wilt thou come <WH935> unto <WH413> me? I will walk <WH1980> within <WH7130> my house <WH1004> with a perfect <WH8537> heart. <WH3824>

I will set <WH7896> no <WH3808> wicked <WH1100> thing <WH1697> before <WH5048> mine eyes: <WH5869> I hate <WH8130> the work <WH6213> of them that turn aside; <WH7750> it shall not <WH3808> cleave <WH1692> to me.
A froward <WH6141> heart <WH3824> shall depart <WH5493> from <WH4480> me: I will not <WH3808> know <WH3045> a wicked <WH7451> person.

Whoso privily <WH5643> slandereth <WH3960> his neighbor, <WH7453> him will I cut off: <WH6789> him that hath a high <WH1362> look <WH5869> and a proud <WH7342> heart <WH3824> will not <WH3808> I suffer. <WH3201>

Mine eyes <WH5869> shall be upon the faithful <WH539> of the land, <WH776> that they may dwell <WH3427> with <WH5978> me: he that walketh <WH1980> in a perfect <WH8549> way, <WH1870> he <WH1931> shall serve <WH8334> me.

He that worketh <WH6213> deceit <WH7423> shall not <WH3808> dwell <WH3427> within <WH7130> my house: <WH1004> he that telleth <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall not <WH3808> tarry <WH3559> in <WH5048> my sight. <WH5869>

I will early <WH1242> destroy <WH6789> all <WH3605> the wicked <WH7563> of the land; <WH776> that I may cut off <WH3772> all <WH3605> wicked <WH205> doers <WH6466> from the city <WH4480> <WH5892> of the LORD. <WH3068>
